data.v: गवां शतसहस्रेण विक्रिणीषे सुतं यदि । पशोरर्थे महाभाग कृतकृत्योऽस्मि भार्गव ॥
data.es: "O Fortunate descendent of the Bhrigu race if your son is sold as a sacrificial animal in exchange for a hundred thousand cows, my purpose will be answered.
data.anv: महाभाग भार्गव O Fortunate descendent of Bhrigu race, sage Richika, गवाम् cows, शतसहस्रेण hundred thousands, सुतम् your son, पशो: अर्थे as scrificial animal, विक्रीणीषे यदि if sold, कृतकृत्य: अस्मि I have fulfilled my purpose.

data.v: सर्वे परिसृता देशा यज्ञियं न लभे पशुम् । दातुमर्हसि मूल्येन सुतमेकमितो मम ॥
data.es: I have roamed all countries but could not final the sacrificial animal. Should'nt you spare one of your sons for a price"?
data.anv: सर्वे all, देशा: countries, परिसृता: roamed about, याज्ञीयम् relating to sacrifice, पशुम् animal, न लभे I could not get, इत: from among them, एकम् one, सुतम् son, मूल्येन for a price, मम for me, दातुम् to give, अर्हसि it behoves of you.

data.v: एवमुक्तो महातेजा ऋचीकस्त्वब्रवीद्वचः । नाहं ज्येष्ठं नरश्रेष्ठं विक्रीणीयां कथंचन ॥
data.es: Thus addressed the exceedingly brilliant Richika said, "O Best among men in no way shall I sell my first born".
data.anv: एवम् thus, उक्त: spoken, महातेजाः exceedingly brilliant, ऋचीकस्तु Richika, वच: these words, अब्रवीत् spoke, नरश्रेष्ठ O Best among men, अहम् I, कथञ्चन in any way, ज्येष्ठम् eldest one, न विक्रीणीयाम् will not sell.

data.v: ऋचीकस्य वचः श्रुत्वा तेषां माता महात्मनाम् । उवाच नरशार्दूलमम्बरीषं तपस्विनी ॥
data.es: Having heard Richika, the miserable mother of great sons, addressed Ambarisha, the foremost of men, saying:
data.anv: ऋचीकस्य Richika's, वच: words, श्रुत्वा having listened, महात्मनाम् of illustrious ones, तेषाम् theirs, माता mother, तपस्विनी a woman in misery, नरशार्दूलम् foremost of men, अम्बरीषम् addressing Ambarisha, उवाच spoke.

data.v: ममापि दयितं विद्धि कनिष्ठं शुनकं नृप ॥
प्रायेण हि नरश्रेष्ठ ज्येष्ठाः पितृषु वल्लभाः । मातॄणां च कनीयांसस्तस्माद्रक्षे कनीयसम् ॥
data.es: "O Best among men generally, the eldest sons are the favourites of their fathers, the youngest their mothers: For that reason, I shall keep my youngest son.
data.anv: नरश्रेष्ठ O Best among men, प्रायेण generally, ज्येष्ठा: eldest sons, पितृषु for their fathers, वल्लभा: beloved, मातृ़णां तु for mothers, कनीयांस: yougest are beloved, तस्मात् for that reason, कनीयसम् yougest son, रक्षे I shall protect.

data.v: उक्तवाक्ये मुनौ तस्मिन्मुनिपत्न्यां तथैव च । शुनःशेपः स्वयं राम मध्यमो वाक्यमब्रवीत् ॥
data.es: O Rama the sage and his wife having spoken thus, their middle son Sunassepha said on his own:
data.anv: राम O Rama, तस्मिन् मुनौ: when that sage, उक्तवाक्ये having spoken thus, तथैव च in the same way, मुनिपत्न्याम् by wife of sage, मध्यम: middle son, शुन:शेफ: Sunas sepha, स्वयम् on his own, वाक्यम् words, अब्रवीत् spoke.

data.v: पिता ज्येष्ठमविक्रेयं माता चाह कनीयसम् । विक्रीतं मध्यमं मन्ये राजन्पुत्रं नयस्व माम् ॥
data.es: O King my father says his eldest son cannot be sold, mother says that her youngest son cannot be spared. From this I think middle son is already sold away. Therefore, take me"
data.anv: राजन् O King, पिता my father, ज्येष्ठम् eldest son, अविक्रेयम् cannot be sold, आह said, माता च mother, कनीयसम् youngest one, मध्यमं पुत्रम् middle son, विक्रीतम् is sold, मन्ये I consider, माम् me, नयस्व you may take me.

data.v: गवां शतसहस्रेण शुनःशेपं नरेश्वरः । गृहीत्वा परमप्रीतो जगाम रघुनन्दन ॥
data.es: "O Delight of the Raghus (Rama) having purchased Sunassepha for a hundred thousands of cows the king refurned immensely pleased.
data.anv: रघुनन्दन O Delighter of Raghus, Rama, नरेश्वरः that king, गवाम् of cows, शतसहस्रेण by  hundred thousands, शुनश्शेफम् Sunassepha, गृहीत्वा having received, परमप्रीत: immensely pleased, जगाम went.

data.v: अम्बरीषस्तु राजर्षी रथमारोप्य सत्वरः । शुनःशेपं महातेजा जगामाशु महायशाः ॥
शुनःशेपं नरश्रेष्ठ गृहीत्वा तु महायशाः । व्यश्राम्यत्पुष्करे राजा मध्याह्ने रघुनन्दन ॥
data.es: O Foremost of men, O Delight of the Raghus (Rama) the illustrious king (Ambarisha) took Sunassepha with him. (On the way) at Pushkara he took some rest at noon.
data.anv: नरश्रेष्ठ O Foremost of men, रघुनन्दन O Rama, महायशा: illustrious, राजा king, शुन:शेफम् Sunassepha, गृहीत्वा having taken, मध्याह्ने by noon, पुष्करे in the Pushkara, व्यश्राम्यत् rested.

data.v: तस्य विश्रममाणस्य शुनःशेपो महायशाः । पुष्करं श्रेष्ठमागम्य विश्वामित्रं ददर्श ह ॥
data.es: While the king was resting at Pushkara, the famous Sunassepha, very much distressed, happened to see his maternal uncle Viswamitra in the company of other sages performing austerities.
data.anv: तस्य as he, विश्रममाणस्य was resting, महायशा: highly famous, शुन:शेफ: Sunassepha, परमातुर: greately aggrieved, पुष्करक्षेत्रम् sacred Pushkara, आगम्य having approached, ऋषिभि:सार्धम्  in the company of other sages, तप्यन्तम् performing austerities, मातुलम् maternal uncle,  विश्वामित्रम् Visvamitra, ददर्श ह beheld.

data.v: विषण्णवदनो दीनस्तृष्णया च श्रमेण च । पपाताङ्के मुने राम वाक्यं चेदमुवाच ह ॥
data.es: With his face discoloured due to thirst and fatigue, he (Sunassepha) immediately fell into the sage's lap in a pitiable condition and said:
data.anv: तृष्णया with thirst, श्रमेण च and fatigue, विवर्णवदन: with discoloured face, दीन: piteous, आशु immediately, मुने: sage's, अङ्के lap, पपात fell, इदम् these, वाक्यम् words, उवाच ह spoke.

data.v: न मेऽस्ति माता न पिता ज्ञातयो बान्धवाः कुतः । त्रातुमर्हसि मां सौम्य धर्मेण मुनिपुंगव ॥
data.es: "O Noble man O Preeminent among ascetics I have no mother nor father nor friends nor relatives. You should protect me according to dharma.
data.anv: सौम्य O Gentle man, मुनिपुङ्गव O Preeminent among ascetics, मे to me, माता mother, नास्ति does no exist, पिता father, न not, ज्ञातय: agnate relations, बान्धवा: relatives, कुत: where?, माम् me, धर्मेण in accordance with righteousness, त्रातुम् to protect, अर्हसि behoves of you.

data.v: त्राता त्वं हि मुनिश्रेष्ठ सर्वेषां त्वं हि भावनः । राजा च कृतकार्यः स्यादहं दीर्घायुरव्ययः ॥
data.es: O Best among ascetics you are the protecor of everybody. You are promoter of others' welfare. May the king fulfil his purpose. May I live long and become immortal and attain heaven after performing great penance. May I enjoy heaven.
data.anv: मुनिश्रेष्ठ O Best among ascetics, त्वम् you, सर्वेषाम् to everybody, त्राता हि protector, त्वम् you, भावन: हि promoter of others' welfare, राजा king, कृतकार्य: fulfilling the purpose, स्यात् become, अहम् I, दीर्घायु: one who has long life, अव्यय: imperishable, अनुत्तमम् great, तप: austerities, तप्त्वा having performed, स्वर्गलोकम् heaven, उपाश्नीयाम् I may enjoy.

data.v: स्वर्गलोकमुपाश्नीयां तपस्तप्त्वा ह्यनुत्तमम् । स मे नाथो ह्यनाथस्य भव भव्येन चेतसा । पितेव पुत्रं धर्मात्मंस्त्रातुमर्हसि किल्बिषात् ॥
data.es: O Virtuous one with a kind heart protect this orphan. Like a father who protects his son, save me from this peril".
data.anv: अनाथस्य an orphan as i am, मे to me, त्वम् you, भव्येन with auspicious, चेतसा mind, नाथ: lord, भव be, धर्मात्मन् O virtuous one, पिता father, पुत्रमिव like son, किल्बिषात् from sin, त्रातुम् to protect, अर्ह्रसि behoves of you.

data.v: तस्य तद्वचनं श्रुत्वा विश्वामित्रो महातपाः । सान्त्वयित्वा बहुविधं पुत्रानिदमुवाच ह ॥
data.es: Having heard Sunassepha, mighty ascetic Viswamitra consoled him in many ways and said to his sons:
data.anv: महातपा: mighty ascetic, विश्वामित्र: Viswamitra, तस्य his, तत् बहुविधम् वचनम् those different kinds of words, श्रुत्वा having listened, सान्त्वयित्वा after consoling him, पुत्रान् addressing his sons, इदम् this word, उवाच spoke.

data.v: यत्कृते पितरः पुत्राञ्जनयन्ति शुभार्थिनः । परलोकहितार्थाय तस्य कालोऽयमागतः ॥
data.anv: शुभार्थिन: men desiring auspiciousness, पितर: parents, यत्कृते for whichever reason, परलोकहितार्थाय for your wellbeing in other worlds, पुत्रान् sons, जनयन्ति begetting, तस्य for that, अयम् काल: the proper time, आगत: has come.

data.v: अयं मुनिसुतो बालो मत्तः शरणमिच्छति । अस्य जीवितमात्रेण प्रियं कुरुत पुत्रकाः ॥
data.es: O sons of the sage this young boy has sought my protection. O Sons you may grant him his desire by merely offering your life.
data.anv: मुनिसुत: son of sage, अयम् this, बाल: young boy, मत्त: from me, शरणम् refuge, इच्छति is  strongly desiring, पुत्रका: O Sons, अस्य for him, जीवितमात्रेण by mere offering of life, प्रियम् dear act, कुरुत you may do.

data.v: सर्वे सुकृतकर्माणः सर्वे धर्मपरायणाः । पशुभूता नरेन्द्रस्य तृप्तिमग्नेः प्रयच्छत ॥
data.es: Engaged in the observance of righteousness, all of you have done virtuous deeds. By becoming sacrificial animals for the king, you may satisfy Agni.
data.anv: सर्वे all of you, सुकृतकर्माण: have done virtuous deeds, सर्वे all of you, धर्मपरायणा: are engaged in the observance of righteousness, नरेन्द्रस्य for the king, पशुभूता: becoming sacrificial animals, अग्ने for Agni, तृप्तिम् satisfaction, प्रयच्छत give.

data.v: नाथवांश्च शुनःशेपो यज्ञश्चाविघ्नतो भवेत् । देवतास्तर्पिताश्च स्युर्मम चापि कृतं वचः ॥
data.es: Then Sunassepha will be protected. The king's sacrifice will continue without hindrance. The gods will be gratified. My words also will come true".
data.anv: शुनशेफ: Sunassepha, नाथवान् च will have a protector, यज्ञश्च sacrifice also, अविघ्नत: without hindrance, भवेत् will become, देवता: devatas, तर्पिता: gratified, स्यु: will become, मम my, वच: च words also, कृतम् will be done.

data.v: मुनेस्तु वचनं श्रुत्वा मधुष्यन्दादयः सुताः । साभिमानं नरश्रेष्ठ सलीलमिदमब्रुवन् ॥
data.es: "O Best of men (Rama) in response to the words of the sage Madhuchanda and others said thus in a casual way with selfesteem.
data.anv: नरश्रेष्ठ O Best of men, मधुच्छन्दादय: Madhuchanda and others, सुता: sons, मुने: ascetics's, वचनम् words, श्रुत्वा having listened, साभिमानम् with selfesteem, सलीलम् with ease, इदम् these words, अब्रुवन् spoke.

data.v: कथमात्मसुतान्हित्वा त्रायसेऽन्यसुतं विभो । अकार्यमिव पश्यामः श्वमांसमिव भोजने ॥
data.es: O Lord protecting other's son by abandoning one' own is like partaking the flesh of a dog. We consider it a prohibited act".
data.anv: विभो O Lord, आत्मसुतान् ones own sons, हित्वा abandoning, अन्यसुतम् other's son, कथम् how, त्रायसे you rescue, भोजने in partaking, श्वमांस इव like the flesh of dog, अकार्यमिव as if a prohibited act, पश्याम: we find.

data.v: तेषां तद्वचनं श्रुत्वा पुत्राणां मुनिपुंगवः । क्रोधसंरक्तनयनो व्याहर्तुमुपचक्रमे ॥
data.es: Having listened to the words of the elephant, Anshuman started enquring the well being of each of the guardians (elephants) of the quarters successively with due respect:
data.anv: मुनिपुङ्गव: preeminent among ascetics, तेषां सर्वेषाम् all their, तत् वचनम् those words, श्रुत्वा having heard, क्रोधसंरक्तनयन: with eyes reddened with anger, सरोषम् with fury, इदम् this word, अब्रवीत् spoke.

data.v: निःसाध्वसमिदं प्रोक्तं धर्मादपि विगर्हितम् । अतिक्रम्य तु मद्वाक्यं दारुणं रोमहर्षणम् ॥
data.es: "(You have) not only trangressed my words but also (you are) censurable according to dharma. You have uttered such audacious and dreadrul words causing the hair to stand on end.
data.anv: मद्वाक्यम् my words, अतिक्रम्य having trangressed, धर्मादपि even according to morality, विगर्हितम् censurable, दारुणम् dreadful, रोमहर्षणम् causing the hair to stand on end, इदम् these words, निस्साध्वसम् audacious, प्रोक्तम् have been uttered.

data.v: श्वमांसभोजिनः सर्वे वासिष्ठा इव जातिषु । पूर्णं वर्षसहस्रं तु पृथिव्यामनुवत्स्यथ ॥
data.es: All of you shall live on earth for a thousand years, like the sons of Vasishta feeding on the flesh of dogs".
data.anv: सर्वे all of you, श्वमांसभोजिन: feeding on the flesh of dog, पूर्णं complete, वर्षसहस्रम् thousand years, पृथिव्याम् on this earth, वासिष्ठा: इव like sons of Vasishta, जातिषु in (Mushtika) race, अनुवत्स्यथ shall dwell.

data.v: कृत्वा शापसमायुक्तान्पुत्रान्मुनिवरस्तदा । शुनःशेपमुवाचार्तं कृत्वा रक्षां निरामयाम् ॥
data.es: Viswamitra the best of ascetics, thus cursed his sons. Sunassepha, (now) was filled with distress. To relieve him of his pain he said:
data.anv: मुनिवर: best of ascetics, पुत्रान् his sons, शाप समायुक्तान् doomed with curse, कृत्वा having made, तथा then, निरामयम् free from pain, रक्षाम् protection, कृत्वा having made, आर्तम् filled with distress, शुन:शेफम् addressing Sunassepha, (इदम् these words), उवाच spoke.

data.v: पवित्रपाशैरासक्तो रक्तमाल्यानुलेपनः । वैष्णवं यूपमासाद्य वाग्भिरग्निमुदाहर ॥
data.es: "Bedaubing your person with red sandal paste and adorned with red garlands, you will be bound to a Vaishnava, sacrificial post with sacred ropes. There invoke Agni with these hymns.
data.anv: वैष्णवं यूपम् Vaishnava sacrificial post, आसाद्य having reached, पवित्रपाशै: with sacred ropes, आसक्त: having bound with, रक्तमाल्यानुलेपन: bedaubing your body with red sandal paste and adorned with red garlands, वाग्भि: with the hymns, अग्निम् Agni, उदाहर invoke.

data.v: इमे तु गाथे द्वे दिव्ये गायेथा मुनिपुत्रक । अम्बरीषस्य यज्ञेऽस्मिंस्ततः सिद्धिमवाप्स्यसि ॥
data.es: O Son of sage chant thse two sacred mantras in the sacrifice of Ambarisha.There after you will achieve success (long life)".
data.anv: मुनिपुत्रक: O Son of the sage, अम्बरीषस्य Ambarisha's, अस्मिन् यज्ञे in this sacrifice, इमे द्वे these two, दिव्ये sacred, गाथे verses, गायेथा: chant, तत: there after, सिद्धिम् success, अवाप्स्यसि you will achieve.

data.v: शुनःशेपो गृहीत्वा ते द्वे गाथे सुसमाहितः । त्वरया राजसिंहं तमम्बरीषमुवाच ह ॥
data.es: Sunassepha memorized the two verses with concentration of mind and hastened towards Amabarisha, a lion among kings. And said:
data.anv: शुनश्शेफ: Sunassepha, सुसमाहित: with concentration of mind, ते द्वे those two, गाथे verses, गृहीत्वा after securing, राजसिंहम् the lion among kings, तम् अम्बरीषम् that Amabarisha, त्वरया quickly, उवाच ह spoke.

data.v: राजसिंह महासत्त्व शीघ्रं गच्छावहे सदः । निवर्तयस्व राजेन्द्र दीक्षां च समुपाहर ॥
data.es: "Endowed with great strength, you are a lion among kings. We shall go to the sacrificial assembly without delay. O Indra among monarchs, take up initiatory rites and perform the sacrifice".
data.anv: महासत्त्व endowed with great strength, राजसिंह lion among kings, सद: sacrificial assembly, शीघ्रम् without dealy, गच्छावहे we shall both go, राजेन्द्र O Indra of monarchs,  निर्वर्तयस्व perform, दीक्षाम् initiatory rites, समुपाविश take up.

data.v: तद्वाक्यमृषिपुत्रस्य श्रुत्वा हर्षं समुत्सुकः । जगाम नृपतिः शीघ्रं यज्ञवाटमतन्द्रितः ॥
data.es: At the words of the sage's son, the king, eager with delight hastened towards the sacrificial ground.
data.anv: नृपति: king, ऋषिपुत्रस्य sage's son's, तत् वाक्यम् those words, श्रुत्वा having heard, हर्षसमुत्सुक:   rejoiced with delight, अतन्द्रित: promptly, यज्ञवाटम् sacrificial ground, जगाम went.

data.v: सदस्यानुमते राजा पवित्रकृतलक्षणम् । पशुं रक्ताम्बरं कृत्वा यूपे तं समबन्धयत् ॥
data.es: With the consent of the officiating priests the king invested Sunasepha with the sacred symbols with Kusa grass, dressed him in red apparel and tied him to the sacrificial post as a sacrificial animal.
data.anv: राजा king, सदस्यानुमते with the consent of officiating priests, तम् that Sunassepha,  पवित्रकृतलक्षणम् forming sacred knots of Kusa grass, रक्ताम्बरम् with red apparel, पशुम् as sacrificial animal, कृत्वा having made, यूपे to the sacrificial post, समबन्धयत् tied.

data.v: स बद्धो वाग्भिरग्र्याभिरभितुष्टाव वै सुरौ । इन्द्रमिन्द्रानुजं चैव यथावन्मुनिपुत्रकः ॥
data.es: Thus bound, the son of the sage praised the two devatas, Indra and Upendra with moving words.
data.anv: बद्ध: having been bound, स: मुनिपुत्रक: the son of sage, इन्द्रम् Indra, इन्द्रानुजं चैव Upendra, सुरौ two devatas, अग्य्राभि: with excellent, वाग्भि: words, यथावत् properly, अभितुष्टाव praised.

data.v: ततः प्रीतः सहस्राक्षो रहस्यस्तुतितर्पितः । दीर्घमायुस्तदा प्रादाच्छुनःशेपाय राघव ॥
data.es: "O Descendant of Raghu (Rama) Indra, gratified with the secret hymn granted Sunassepha long life.
data.anv: राघव O Rama, तत: then, रहस्यस्तुतितर्पित: gratified with secret praise, सहस्राक्ष: Indra, प्रीत: pleased, तदा then, शुन:शेफाय for Sunasepha, दीर्घम् long, आयु: life, प्रादात् gave.

data.v: स च राजा नरश्रेष्ठ यज्ञस्य च समाप्तवान् । फलं बहुगुणं राम सहस्राक्षप्रसादजम् ॥
data.es: O Foremost of men O Rama the king also obtained from the sacrifics innumerable rewards by the grace of Indra several times greater than expected.
data.anv: नरश्रेष्ठ O Foremost of men, राम Rama, स: राजा च that king also, सहस्राक्षप्रसादजम् through  the grace of Indra, बहुगुणम् several times, यज्ञस्य   of sacrifice, फलम् fruits, समाप्तवान् obtained.

data.v: विश्वामित्रोऽपि धर्मात्मा भूयस्तेपे महातपाः । पुष्करेषु नरश्रेष्ठ दशवर्षशतानि च ॥
data.es: O Best among men the righteous and mighty ascetic Viswamitra also continued his austerities at Pushkara for a thousand years".इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये बालकाण्डे द्विषष्टितमस्सर्ग:॥Thus ends the sixtysecond sarga of Balakanda of the holy Ramayana the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.
data.anv: नरश्रेष्ठ O Best among men, धर्मत्मा the righteous, महातपा: mighty ascetic, विश्वामित्र: अपि Visvamitra also, पुष्करेषु in that sacred spot name Pushkara, दशवर्षशतानि thousand years, भूय: again, तेपे continued his austerities.

data.v: पूर्णे वर्षसहस्रे तु व्रतस्नातं महामुनिम् । अभ्यागच्छन्सुराः सर्वे तपःफलचिकीर्षवः ॥
data.es: All the gods wanted to bestow the fruits of austerties on the mighty ascetic (Viswamitra). They approached him after a thousand years of penace and his final ritual bath.
data.anv: वर्षसहस्रे when thousand years, पूर्णे had been completed, सर्वे all, सुरा: devatas, तप: फलचिकीर्षव: desiring to bestow the fruits of his austerities, व्रतस्नातम् who had taken the ritual bath after completion of the ritual, महामुनिम् mighty ascetic, अभ्यागच्छन् approached.

data.v: अब्रवीत्सुमहातेजा ब्रह्मा सुरुचिरं वचः । ऋषिस्त्वमसि भद्रं ते स्वार्जितैः कर्मभिः शुभैः ॥
data.es: Exceedingly effulgent Brahma spoke to him, "You have become a rishi through the selfearned sacred deeds. Fare you well".
data.anv: सुमहातेजा: exceedingly effulgent, ब्रह्मा Brahma, सुरुचिरम् attractive, वच: words, अब्रवीत् spoke, त्वम् you, स्वार्जितै: with selfearned, शुभै: कर्मभि: sacred deeds, ऋषि: असि have become Rishi, ते भद्रम् prosperity to you.

data.v: तमेवमुक्त्वा देवेशस्त्रिदिवं पुनरभ्यगात् । विश्वामित्रो महातेजा भूयस्तेपे महत्तपः ॥
data.es: Brahma, the lord of the gods, having said this returned to heaven. The brilliant Viswamitra continues his austerities.
data.anv: देवेश: lord of devatas, तम् him, एवम् thus, उक्त्वा having spoken, पुन: again, त्रिदिवम् towards heaven, अभ्यगात् went, महातेजा: a man of mighty effulgence, विश्वामित्र: Visvamitra, भूय: again, महत् great, तप: austerities, तेपे performed.

data.v: ततः कालेन महता मेनका परमाप्सराः । पुष्करेषु नरश्रेष्ठ स्नातुं समुपचक्रमे ॥
data.es: "O Foremost of men after a long lapse of time a chief nymph called Menaka came to bathe at Pushkara.
data.anv: नरश्रेष्ठ O foremost of men, तत: thereafter, महता great, कालेन after a great lapse of time, मेनका one named Menaka, परमाप्सरा: freatest among nymphs, पुष्करेषु in the spot at Pushkara, स्नातुम् to bathe, समुपचक्रमे commenced.

data.v: तां ददर्श महातेजा मेनकां कुशिकात्मजः । रूपेणाप्रतिमां तत्र विद्युतं जलदे यथा ॥
data.es: There the most brilliant son of Kusika Viswamitra saw Menaka whose beauty was incomparable. She looked like lightning in the clouds.
data.anv: महातेजा: highly lustrous, कुशिकात्मज: son of Kusika, Visvamitra, तत्र in that Pushkara, जलदे in the clouds, विद्युतं यथा like lightening, रूपेण in beauty, अप्रतिमाम् incomparable, ताम्  मेनकाम् that Menaka, ददर्श beheld.

data.v: दृष्ट्वा कन्दर्पवशगो मुनिस्तामिदमब्रवीत् । अप्सरः स्वागतं तेऽस्तु वस चेह ममाश्रमे । अनुगृह्णीष्व भद्रं ते मदनेन सुमोहितम् ॥
data.es: On seeing her (Menaka) Viswamitra came under the influence of the god of love (fell in love with her). He said, O Apsara welcome to my hermitage stay here. I am infatuated with you: Oblige me. Wish you well.
data.anv: दृष्ट्वा having seen, मुनि: sage Visvamitra, कन्दर्पवशग: under the influence of Kandarpa,  Cupid, ताम् her, इदम् these words, अब्रवीत् spoke, अप्सर: O Apsarasa, ते to you, स्वागतम् अस्तु wecome, मम my, इह here, आश्रमे hermitage, वस च dwell, मदनेन by Manmatha,  सुमोहितम् highly infatuated, अनुगृह्णीष्व favour me, ते भद्रम् safety to you.

data.v: इत्युक्ता सा वरारोहा तत्रावासमथाकरोत् । तपसो हि महाविघ्नो विश्वामित्रमुपागतः ॥
data.es: "O Descendant of Raghu while that woman of an exalted race lived in the hermitage of Viswamitra, ten years rolled by happily".
data.anv: राघव O Rama, सा वरारोहा that women of exalted breeding, इति thus, उक्ता having been spoken, अथ thereafter, तत्र there, वासम् habitation, अकरोत् made, राम O Rama, तस्याम्  while she, विश्वामित्राश्रमे in the hermitage of Visvamitra, वसन्त्याम् while living, पञ्च पञ्च च ten, वर्षाणि years, सुखेन happily, व्यतिचक्रमु: passed away.

data.v: तस्यां वसन्त्यां वर्षाणि पञ्च पञ्च च राघव । विश्वामित्राश्रमे सौम्य सुखेन व्यतिचक्रमुः ॥
data.es: "O Descendant of Raghu while that woman of an exalted race lived in the hermitage of Viswamitra, ten years rolled by happily".
data.anv: राघव O Rama, सा वरारोहा that women of exalted breeding, इति thus, उक्ता having been spoken, अथ thereafter, तत्र there, वासम् habitation, अकरोत् made, राम O Rama, तस्याम्  while she, विश्वामित्राश्रमे in the hermitage of Visvamitra, वसन्त्याम् while living, पञ्च पञ्च च ten, वर्षाणि years, सुखेन happily, व्यतिचक्रमु: passed away.

data.v: अथ काले गते तस्मिन्विश्वामित्रो महामुनिः । सव्रीड इव संवृत्तश्चिन्ताशोकपरायणः ॥
data.es: As the period passed, Viswamitra the mighty ascetic was filled with grief, anxiety and remorse.
data.anv: अथ there after, तस्मिन् काले when that period, गते was spent, महामुनि: mighty ascetic, विश्वामित्र: Visvamitra, चिन्ताशोकपरायण: filled with grief and sorrowful thought, सव्रीड इव as though with shame, सम्वृत्त: became.

data.v: बुद्धिर्मुनेः समुत्पन्ना सामर्षा रघुनन्दन । सर्वं सुराणां कर्मैतत्तपोऽपहरणं महत् ॥
data.es: O Delight of the Raghus (Rama) a sense of indignation filled the mind of the ascetic. 'All this is the conspiracy of the gods to deprive me of my great austerities', he thought.
data.anv: राघुनन्दन O Rama, मुने: for the ascetic, सामर्षा filled with indignation, बुद्धि: a thought, समुत्पन्ना arose, एतत् सर्वम् all this, महत् great, तपोपहरणम् taking away tapas, सुराणाम् devatas', कर्म deed.

data.v: अहोरात्रापदेशेन गताः संवत्सरा दश । काममोहाभिभूतस्य विघ्नोऽयं प्रत्युपस्थितः ॥
data.es: Night and day deluded by lust I have wasted ten years. A hindrance has been posed (to my tapas).
data.anv: काममोहाभिभूतस्य for me possessed by lust and delusion, दश संवत्सरा: ten years, अहोरात्रापदेशेन under the pretext of day and night, गता: have passed by, अयम् विघ्न: this hindrance, समुपस्थित: has befallen.

data.v: विनिःश्वसन्मुनिवरः पश्चात्तापेन दुःखितः ॥
भीतामप्सरसं दृष्ट्वा वेपन्तीं प्राञ्जलिं स्थिताम् । मेनकां मधुरैर्वाक्यैर्विसृज्य कुशिकात्मजः । उत्तरं पर्वतं राम विश्वामित्रो जगाम ह ॥
data.es: "O Rama Viswamitra, the best of ascetics sighed with repentance, distressed with grief. On seeing him, the apsara started trembling in fear. She stood before him with folded palms. (But) with sweet words the son of Kushika left her and proceeded towards the northern mountains.
data.anv: राम O Rama, मुनिवर: best of ascetics, कुशिकात्मज: son of Kusika, विश्वामित्र: Viswamitra, पश्चात्तापेन with repentence, दु:खित: distressed, विनिश्वसन् sighing, भीताम् freightened,  प्राञ्जलिं स्थिताम् standing with folded palms, वेपन्तीम् trembling, अप्सरसम् apsara, मेनकाम् Menaka, दृष्ट्वा having seen, मधुरै: with sweet, वाक्यै: words, विसृज्य after permitting her to leave, उत्तरं पर्वतम् northern mountain, जगाम ह went.

data.v: स कृत्वा नैष्ठिकीं बुद्धिं जेतुकामो महायशाः । कौशिकीतीरमासाद्य तपस्तेपे सुदारुणम् ॥
data.es: Illustrious Viswamitra took a vow of celibacy in order to control his senses. And performed rigid austerities on reaching the bank of river Kausiki.
data.anv: महायशा: highly illustrious, स: he (that Visvamitra), नैष्ठिकीम् life long abstinence and chastity, बुद्धिम् mind, कृत्वा having made, जेतुकाम: with a view to control his senses, कौशिकीतीरम् the banks of the Kausiki river, आसाद्य having reached, सुदारुणम् highly rigid, तप: austerities, तेपे performed.

data.v: तस्य वर्षसहस्रं तु घोरं तप उपासतः । उत्तरे पर्वते राम देवतानामभूद्भयम् ॥
data.es: O Rama while he was performing rigorous penance for a thousand years on the northern mountains, the gods were gripped with fear. (lest he should exceed them).
data.anv: राम O Rama, तस्य for him, उत्तरे पर्वते on the northern mountains, वर्षसहस्रम् a thousand years, घोरम् fearful, तप: penance, उपासत: while performing, देवतानाम् to devatas, भयम्  अभूत् fear arose.

data.v: अमन्त्रयन्समागम्य सर्वे सर्षिगणाः सुराः । महर्षिशब्दं लभतां साध्वयं कुशिकात्मजः ॥
data.es: After consultations the gods and sages decided that this son of Kushika (Viswamitra) deserved the status of a Maharshi".
data.anv: सर्षिगणा: along with hosts of rishis, सर्वे all, सुरा: devatas, समागम्य having met together, अयम् कुशिकात्मज: this Viswamitra, साधु rightly, महर्षिशब्दम् title of Maharshi, लभताम् be obtained, आमन्त्रयन् thought over.

data.v: देवतानां वचः श्रुत्वा सर्वलोकपितामहः । अब्रवीन्मधुरं वाक्यं विश्वामित्रं तपोधनम् ॥
data.es: Hearing the words of the devatas, Brahma, the Grandsire of all the worlds consoled the devatas with sweet words, saying:
data.anv: सर्वलोकपितामह: grandsire of all the worlds, देवतानाम् devatas, वच: words, श्रुत्वा having heard, मधुरै: with sweet, वाक्यै: words, त्रिदशान् devatas, सान्त्वयन् consoling, इदम् these words, अब्रवीत् spoke.

data.v: महर्षे स्वागतं वत्स तपसोग्रेण तोषितः । महत्त्वमृषिमुख्यत्वं ददामि तव कौशिक ॥
data.es: "O Maharshi O Child welcome Pleased with your intense austerities, O Son of Kushika I confer upon you the eminent rank of a great rishi (maharshi)".
data.anv: महर्षे O Maharshi, वत्स O Child, स्वागतम् welcome, उग्रेण with intense, तपसा austerities, तोषित: I have been pleased, कौशिक O Son of Kusika, Visvamitra, तव your, महत्त्वम् eminenence, ऋषिमुख्यत्वम् preeminence among sages (maharshi hood), ददामि I here by give.

data.v: ब्रह्मणः स वचः श्रुत्वा विश्वामित्रस्तपोधनः । प्राञ्जलिः प्रणतो भूत्वा प्रत्युवाच पितामहम् ॥
data.es: After listening to the manly command of ascetic Viswamitra, Rama, of the lineage of Raghu, the son of the foremost of men and firm in determination, replied with folded palms:
data.anv: दृढव्रत: a man firm in his vows, नरवरात्मज: the son of the foremost of men, राघव: Rama, अक्लीबम् determined, manly and bold, मुने: ascetic's, वचनम् words, श्रुत्वा having listened, प्राञ्जलि:भूत्वा with folded palms, प्रत्युवाच replied.

data.v: ब्रह्मर्षि शब्दमतुलं स्वार्जितैः कर्मभिः शुभैः । यदि मे भगवानाह ततोऽहं विजितेन्द्रियः ॥
data.es: "O Adorable one, if you have conferred the incomparable title of 'Maharshi' earned by my auspicious deeds, I feel I have conquered the senses."
data.anv: भगवान् adorable one, स्वार्जितै: earned by me, शुभै: by the auspicious, कर्मभि: deeds, अतुलम् incomparble, महर्षिशब्दम् title of Maharshi, मे to me, आह यदि if it has been told, तत: then, अहम् I, विजितेन्द्रिय: have conquered my senses.

data.v: तमुवाच ततो ब्रह्मा न तावत्त्वं जितेन्द्रियः । यतस्व मुनिशार्दूल इत्युक्त्वा त्रिदिवं गतः ॥
data.es: Then Brahma said to him, 'You have not conquered the senses yet. O Tiger among ascetics, strive still.' Having said this he went toward heaven.
data.anv: तत: then, ब्रह्मा Brahma, तम् addressing him, उवाच said, त्त्वम् you, जितेन्द्रियस्तावत् having conquered the senses, न not, मुनिशार्दूल O Best among ascestics, यतस्व strive still, इति thus, उक्त्वा having spoken, त्रिदिवम् towards heaven, गत: went.

data.v: विप्रस्थितेषु देवेषु विश्वामित्रो महामुनिः । ऊर्ध्वबाहुर्निरालम्बो वायुभक्षस्तपश्चरन् ॥
data.es: After the departure of the gods, mighty ascetic Viswamitra raised his arms up, stood without support, subsisting on air, continuing with his austerities.
data.anv: देवेषु when devatas, विप्रस्थितेषु सत्सु after having departed, महामुनि: mighty ascetic, विश्वामित्र: Visvamitra, ऊर्ध्वबाहु: with arms raised upwards, निरालम्ब: without support, वायुभक्ष: subsisting on air, तपश्चरन् while performimg.

data.v: धर्मे पञ्चतपा भूत्वा वर्षास्वाकाशसंश्रयः । शिशिरे सलिलस्थायी रात्र्यहानि तपोधनः ॥
data.es: Viswamitra whose wealth was his penance carried on his rigid austerities for a thousand years amidst five fires, in summer, under the open sky in monsoon, and immersed in ater night and day in winter.
data.anv: तपोधन: that Visvamitra whose asceticism was his wealth, घर्मे in summer, पञ्चतपा: भूत्वा performing penance amidst five fires, वर्षासु during rainy season, आकाशसंश्रयः taking refuge under the open sky, शिशिरे in the cold season, रात्र्यहानि day and night, सलिलस्थायी immersed in water, एवम् thus, वर्षसहस्रम् for a thousand years, घोरम् rigid, तप: austerities, उपागमत् performed.

data.v: एवं वर्षसहस्रं हि तपो घोरमुपागमत् ॥
तस्मिन्संतप्यमाने तु विश्वामित्रे महामुनौ । संभ्रमः सुमहानासीत्सुराणां वासवस्य च ॥
data.es: When the mighty asetic Viswamitra was peforming penance, the gods as well as Indra got deeply perturbed.
data.anv: महामुनौ when the mighty ascestic, तस्मिन् विश्वामित्रे that Visvamitra, सन्तप्यमाने while peforming penance, सुराणाम् for devatas, वासवस्य च for Indra also, सुमहान् greatly, संभ्रम: आसीत् perturbance over took.

data.v: रम्भामप्सरसं शक्रः सह सर्वैर्मरुद्गणैः । उवाचात्महितं वाक्यमहितं कौशिकस्य च ॥
data.es: Indra along with all the maruts spoke to the celestial nymph Rambha, words that augured well for them and not for kaushika (Viswamitra).इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये बालकाण्डे त्रिषष्टितमस्सर्ग:॥Thus ends the sixtythird sarga of Balakanda of the holy Ramayana the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.
data.anv: शक्र: Indra, सर्वै: all, मरुद्गणै: सह along with maruts, आत्महितम् promoting his welfare, कौशिकस्य for Kausika, अहितं च against his welfare, वाक्यम् words, रम्भाम् named Rambha, अप्सरसम् celestial nymph, उवाच said.

data.v: सुरकार्यमिदं रम्भे कर्तव्यं सुमहत्त्वया । लोभनं कौशिकस्येह काममोहसमन्वितम् ॥
data.es: "O Rambha you must entice Viswamitra by lust and passion. This important work must be done by you in the interest of the gods".

data.v: तथोक्ता साप्सरा राम सहस्राक्षेण धीमता । व्रीडिता प्राञ्जलिर्भूत्वा प्रत्युवाच सुरेश्वरम् ॥

data.v: अयं सुरपते घोरो विश्वामित्रो महामुनिः । क्रोधमुत्स्रक्ष्यते घोरं मयि देव न संशयः । ततो हि मे भयं देव प्रसादं कर्तुमर्हसि ॥
data.es: 'Lord of the devatas this mighty ascetic Viswamitra is a terrible person. He will ceratinly release on his dreadful anger (curse me). O Lord this is my apprehension. You should excuse me'.
data.anv: सुरपते O Lord of devatas, अयम् महामुनि: this mighty ascetic, विश्वामित्र: Visvamitra, घोर: is a frightful person, देव O Lord, मयि in me, घोरम् fearful, क्रोधम् wrath, उत्सृजते will release, संशय: न no doubt, तत: for that reason, मे my, भयम् fear, देव O lord, प्रसादम् favour, कर्तुम् to do, अर्हसि behoves of you.

data.v: तामुवाच सहस्राक्षो वेपमानां कृताञ्जलिम् । मा भैषि रम्भे भद्रं ते कुरुष्व मम शासनम् ॥
कोकिलो हृदयग्राही माधवे रुचिरद्रुमे । अहं कन्दर्पसहितः स्थास्यामि तव पार्श्वतः ॥
data.es: 'O Rambha have no fear. Feel safe. Carry out my order. When the trees look so beautiful in spring I shall in captivating the form of a cuckoo, stay by your side in the company of Kamadeva (Cupid).
data.anv: रम्भे O Rambha, मा भैषी: have no fear, ते भद्रम् safety to you, मम my, शासनम् order, कुरुष्व carry out, अहम् I, रुचिरद्रुमे with booming trees, माधवे in the season of Spring, हृदयग्राही captivating the heart, कोकिल: cuckoo, कन्दर्पसहित: in the company of Kandarpa, Cupid, तव your, पार्श्वत: side, स्थास्यामि will stay.

data.v: त्वं हि रूपं बहुगुणं कृत्वा परमभास्वरम् । तमृषिं कौशिकं रम्भे भेदयस्व तपस्विनम् ॥

data.v: सा श्रुत्वा वचनं तस्य कृत्वा रूपमनुत्तमम् । लोभयामास ललिता विश्वामित्रं शुचिस्मिता ॥

data.v: कोकिलस्य तु शुश्राव वल्गु व्याहरतः स्वनम् । संप्रहृष्टेन मनसा तत एनामुदैक्षत ॥
data.es: Excited by the charming warble of the cuckoo, Viswamitra opened his eyes.

data.v: अथ तस्य च शब्देन गीतेनाप्रतिमेन च । दर्शनेन च रम्भाया मुनिः संदेहमागतः ॥

data.v: सहस्राक्षस्य तत्कर्म विज्ञाय मुनिपुंगवः । रम्भां क्रोधसमाविष्टः शशाप कुशिकात्मजः ॥
data.es: Son of Kushika, the eminent ascetic knew it was the work of Indra. Seized with anger, he cursed Rambha:

data.v: यन्मां लोभयसे रम्भे कामक्रोधजयैषिणम् । दशवर्षसहस्राणि शैली स्थास्यसि दुर्भगे ॥
data.es: 'O luckless Rambha, since you have endeavoured to distract me from my desire to conquer wrath and passion, you shall turn into a rock and remain so for ten thousand years'.
data.anv: दुर्भगे O Unfortunate one, रम्भे Rambha, कामक्रोधजयैषिणम् with a desire to conquer wrath and passion, माम् me, यत् since, लोभयसे seduce me (for that reason), दश वर्षसहस्राणि ten thousand years, शैली as rock, स्थास्यसि shall become.

data.v: ब्राह्मणः सुमहातेजास्तपोबलसमन्वितः । उद्धरिष्यति रम्भे त्वां मत्क्रोधकलुषीकृताम् ॥
data.es: 'O Rambha an effulgent brahmin, endowed with the power of asceticism, will liberate you from this state into which you have fallen on account of my anger'.
data.anv: रम्भे O Rambha, सुमहातेजा: highly splendrous, तपोबलसमन्वित: endowed with the power of asceticism, ब्राह्मण: Brahmana, मत्क्रोधकलुषीकृताम् fouled on account of my anger, त्वाम् you, उद्धरिष्यति will liberate.

data.v: एवमुक्त्वा महातेजा विश्वामित्रो महामुनिः । अशक्नुवन्धारयितुं कोपं संतापमागतः ॥
data.es: The brilliant Viswamitra, the great ascetic, now experienced remorse for his inability to contain anger.
data.anv: महातेजा: highly lustrous, महामुनि: great ascetic, एवम् उक्त्वा having spoken in this way, विरराम rested, सर्वे मुनय: all sages, साधु साधु इति well said, well said, thus, तम् him, अभ्यपूजयन् praised.

data.v: तस्य शापेन महता रम्भा शैली तदाभवत् । वचः श्रुत्वा च कन्दर्पो महर्षेः स च निर्गतः ॥
data.es: This mighty curse, of the great saint transformed Rambha into a rock and sent Kamadeva and Indra to their heels.
data.anv: तदा then, तस्य his महता by great, शापेन (because of )curse, रम्भा Rambha, शैली अभवत् became a rock, महर्षे: maharshi's, वच: words, श्रुत्वा having listened, कन्दर्प: Kandarapa, स: च devendra, निर्गत: fled away.

data.v: कोपेन स महातेजास्तपोऽपहरणे कृते । इन्द्रियैरजितै राम न लेभे शान्तिमात्मनः ॥
data.es: "O Rama highly powerful Viswamitra was deprived of his ascetic merit due to his anger. He had no peace of mind for his inability to control his senses.
data.anv: राम O Rama, महातेजा: highly powerful, स: Visvamitra, कोपेन with anger, तपोपहरणे in deprivation of his ascetic merit, कृते having been made, अजितै: with unconquered,  इन्द्रियै: senses, आत्मन: his own, शान्तिम् peace, न लेभे did not get.

data.v: अथ हैमवतीं राम दिशं त्यक्त्वा महामुनिः । पूर्वां दिशमनुप्राप्य तपस्तेपे सुदारुणम् ॥
data.es: "O Rama thereafter the great ascetic (Viswamitra), abandoning the north of the Himavat mountain reached the eastern quarter and performed rigorous austerities.
data.anv: राम O Rama, अथ thereafter, महामुनि: great ascetic Visvamitra, हैमवतीम् relating to Himavat mountain, दिशम् quarter, त्यक्त्वा abandoning, पूर्वां दिशम् eastern quarter, अनुप्राप्य having reached, सुदारुणम् rigorous, तप: austerities, तेपे performed.

data.v: मौनं वर्षसहस्रस्य कृत्वा व्रतमनुत्तमम् । चकाराप्रतिमं राम तपः परमदुष्करम् ॥
data.es: Having observed a unique vow of silence for a thousand years, O Rama he practised unprecedented and extremely difficult austerities.
data.anv: राम O Rama, वर्षसहस्रस्य for a thousand years, अनुत्तमम् immense, मौनं व्रतं vow of silence, कृत्वा having observed, अप्रतिमम् unprecedented, परमदुष्करम् extremely difficult, तप: austerities, चकार practised.

data.v: पूर्णे वर्षसहस्रे तु काष्ठभूतं महामुनिम् । विघ्नैर्बहुभिराधूतं क्रोधो नान्तरमाविशत् ॥
data.es: After completion of a thousand years the great ascetic became a piece of wood. In spite of many impediments, he was unshaken, anger did not enter into his mind. O Rama with firm determination he practised austerities.

data.v: ततो देवाः सगन्धर्वाः पन्नगासुरराक्षसाः । मोहितास्तेजसा तस्य तपसा मन्दरश्मयः । कश्मलोपहताः सर्वे पितामहमथाब्रुवन् ॥
data.es: Thereupon devatas along with gandharvas, pannagas, uragas, and rakshasas, stood bewildered by his ascetic energy. Their own glory was dimmed in his lustre". Afflicted with anguish, they spoke to the Grandsire (Brahma):

data.v: बहुभिः कारणैर्देव विश्वामित्रो महामुनिः । लोभितः क्रोधितश्चैव तपसा चाभिवर्धते ॥
data.es: "O Lord the great sage Viswamitra was lured and angered in various ways. But his austerities continued to grow:

data.v: न ह्यस्य वृजिनं किंचिद्दृश्यते सूक्ष्ममप्यथ । न दीयते यदि त्वस्य मनसा यदभीप्सितम् । विनाशयति त्रैलोक्यं तपसा सचराचरम् । व्याकुलाश्च दिशः सर्वा न च किंचित्प्रकाशते ॥
data.es: His penance was flawless. If his wishes were not granted, he will surely destroy by his austerities the three worlds with all movables and immovables.
data.anv: अथ also, अस्य his, सूक्ष्ममपि even minute, वृजिनम् sin, किञ्चित् a little, न दृश्यते not to be seen, अस्य his, मनसा by mind, यत् which, अभीप्सितम् is desired, न दीयते यदि if not given,  तपसा with his austerities, सचराचरम् moveable and immoveable, त्रैलोक्यम् the three worlds together, विनाशयति will destroy.

data.v: सागराः क्षुभिताः सर्वे विशीर्यन्ते च पर्वताः । प्रकम्पते च पृथिवी वायुर्वाति भृशाकुलः ॥
बुद्धिं न कुरुते यावन्नाशे देव महामुनिः । तावत्प्रसाद्यो भगवानग्निरूपो महाद्युतिः ॥
data.es: O Lord before this mighty, venerable ascetic, effulgent like fire decides to destroy the three worlds, he should be appeased.
data.anv: देव O Lord, महामुनि: the mighty ascetic, नाशे in destruction, यावत् until, बुद्धिम् mind, न कुरुते does not make, तावत् till then, अग्निरूप: resembling fire, महाद्युति: highly effulgent, भगवान् venerable, Visvamitra, प्रसाद्य: should be appeased.

data.v: कालाग्निना यथा पूर्वं त्रैलोक्यं दह्यतेऽखिलम् । देवराज्ये चिकीर्षेत दीयतामस्य यन्मतम् ॥

data.v: ततः सुरगणाः सर्वे पितामहपुरोगमाः । विश्वामित्रं महात्मानं वाक्यं मधुरमब्रुवन् ॥

data.v: ब्रह्मर्षे स्वागतं तेऽस्तु तपसा स्म सुतोषिताः । ब्राह्मण्यं तपसोग्रेण प्राप्तवानसि कौशिक ॥
